item.name: Topaz Necklace
item.desc: A necklace decorated with a Topaz.

item.name: Melted Platinum Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Platinum Ore.

item.name: Topaz
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding Rough Topaz.

item.name: Gold Topaz Necklace
item.desc: A necklace decorated with a Gold Topaz.
